author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...SARA MOVING SLOWLY WESTWARD ALONG THE NORTH COAST OF HONDURAS... ...LIFE-THREATENING AND POTENTIALLY CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING AND MUDSLIDES WILL CONTINUE IN HONDURAS THROUGH THE WEEKEND...
summary:
...SARA MOVING SLOWLY WESTWARD ALONG THE NORTH COAST OF HONDURAS... ...LIFE-THREATENING AND POTENTIALLY CATASTROPHIC FLASH FLOODING AND MUDSLIDES WILL CONTINUE IN HONDURAS THROUGH THE WEEKEND...
 As of 3:00 AM CST Fri Nov 15
 the center of Sara was located near 16.0, -85.1
 with movement W at 9 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 999 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.
